price: Do you feel secure that He Who is above heaven will not cause the earth to sink with you, and then suddenly convulse[6]?
arabic: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخۡسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَمُورُ
